title: Agent Arena: agent signs txs, CI, deploy ready
body: Shipped end-to-end. Program (Anchor): init_arena, submit_move_first, submit_move, stake. Agent (Node): instructions.js + run.js builds and signs tx, submits to devnet. App: GET /api/arena. Tests and CI in repo. Repo: https://github.com/grump-fun/agent-arb
